#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int T;
	cin >> T;
	if (T < 40)
	{
		while (T--)
		{
			string str;
			int hole = 0;
			cin >> str;
			int len = str.length();
			if (len > 100)
				break;
			for (int j = 0; j < len; j++)
			{
				if ((str[j] == 'A') || (str[j] == 'D') || (str[j] == 'O') || (str[j] == 'P') || (str[j] == 'R') || (str[j] == 'Q'))
					hole++;
				if (str[j] == 'B')
					hole += 2;
			}
			cout << hole << endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
